long_description: northwoods premium confections is a classic 'mom and pop' candy shop with a northwoods theme in the heart of beautiful downtown beloit, wisconsin. utilizing three generations of family recipes, we handcraft fine chocolates, gourmet popcorn, fresh fudge and handmade candies. we feel that the quality and selection that we offer rivals some of the best candy shops in the most popular tourist destinations. browse our section of nostalgic candies or try one of our 28 flavors of wisconsin made premium ice cream. family owned and operated, the business was founded in the northwoods of wisconsin in 2008. we have been serving the stateline area since 2009 and we established our downtown beloit location in 2013. we look forward to seeing you soon
generated_description: northwoods premium confections is a business located in beloit, wisconsin, united states. it operates as a chocolate shop, candy store, ice cream shop, and popcorn store. the establishment offers a variety of confectionery products, including homemade candy and bulk candy.

company_commercial_names: northwoods premium confections314 | northwoods premium confections | northwoods premium
long_description: nostalgic candy, fresh confections, fine chocolates, gourmet popcorn, premium ice cream, fresh fudge and more. northwoods premium confections is your one-stop shop for all of your candy needs. northwoods has you covered. if you are a chocolate connoisseur, northwoods is the place for you. we utilize three generations of family recipes to make fresh products in house. our popcorn is great as a snack and it's also available in bulk as a special order for weddings, parties and corporate events. we are proud purveyors of chocolate shoppe brand ice cream. it's made locally in madison wisconsin by people who care since 1962. just got serious (salted caramel, cashews & fudge). our fudge is made fresh in small batches with wisconsin butter and cream.
generated_description: northwoods premium confections is a classic candy shop located in downtown beloit, wisconsin. established in 2013, the family-owned business specializes in handcrafted chocolates, gourmet popcorn, fresh fudge, and handmade candies. utilizing three generations of family recipes, northwoods premium confections offers a wide selection of nostalgic and modern candies, including caramel corn, saltwater taffy, and premium ice cream. the shop serves the stateline area, including beloit, south beloit, roscoe, rockton, machesney park, loves park, rockford il, and janesville wi.
